Package in.co.rays.Proj4.model

Class CourseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.Proj4.model.CourseModel
  • public class CourseModel
extends java.lang.Object
    CourseModel provides the data access logic for the Course entity. It supports operations such as add, update, delete, find, and search. This class uses JDBC for database communication and handles exceptions via custom exception classes such as ApplicationException, DatabaseException, and DuplicateRecordException. Table used: st_course
    Author:
    Sanjana Gangrade

        Parameters:
        bean - CourseBean with search criteria (can be null)
